reviews.title: Fast and Efficient Delivery
reviews.text: Had an amazing first time experience with Porter. Very affordable price and excellent service. Asim, my rider, was very accomodating and professional. Keep it up, Porter! üëèüëèüëè

reviews.title: Worst customer service
reviews.text:
3 months ago I made an order and paid by cash for the rider + tips 
After 3 months I make another order for trip and they charged me again for the previous order which I already paid long time! They called and did the investigation with the rider but until now no refund or anything for double charging me. 
What a poor service!!

reviews.title: Charged wrongly
reviews.text:
I recently used the Porter app to send a truck for delivery in Dubai. While the service itself was convenient, the payment experience was frustrating. I paid the driver 150 AED in cash as agreed, but later, the app kept asking me for a separate payment through the app. Despite providing proof of payment to the driver, the support team kept insisting on additional payment.

This kind of confusion and lack of communication between the app and its drivers is disappointing. Until they improve their payment system and customer support, I‚Äôd recommend being cautious when using this service.

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.text: So helpful,  proper pick up and drop off

reviews.title: Delivery
reviews.text: Easy to book a delivery. Prompt real time tracking of the vehicle , right from booking to delivery. Transparent transactions. Price is reasonable.

reviews.title: Bad apps
reviews.text:
This app is not good‚Ä¶
At first fare show 169tk.
When i receive product then he show me fare is 390tk

reviews.title: Documents
reviews.text: No good service , no backpack at all.

reviews.title: 3 changes later , still waiting
reviews.text: Was assigned a partner, gave a deposit only to be told day before move that it‚Äôs a holiday so the booking can‚Äôt go through. I scrambled to make the move that same day and was assigned a Porter with an open truck on a rain day. I asked to cancel the whole thing and was instead randomly assigned a third partner who is a no show. I‚Äôm appalled at the lack of disclosure (open trucks) and inability to Porter to keep their end of the bargain. The porters seem a law unto themselves, the third one went silent after calling to fix up a time with me.

reviews.title: Worst service
reviews.text: I just downloaded the app two days back, just to check the pricing, I was getting continuous calls from the service. I stopped using on that day. Again today I just opened the app and I was checking the pricing again I was getting continuous calls even though I asked them to not call me multiple times. Whats the point of having an app when you are running a call centre like service. And how come you are getting the information about what activity I am doing on app. Its so inconvenient and unsafe. I just deleted the app today.

reviews.title: Poor Packer & Mover service
reviews.text:
I recently used their packers and movers service and it was pathetic. The supervisor listed didn‚Äôt came to visit it himself and sent some other workers. Also, they handled the items really bad and dragged the refrigerator and washing machine on a concrete road. The items got some dents too during transit and when complained about it to the customer support they were unhelpful and didn‚Äôt do anything about it and closed the ticket.

Pathetic experience, never use packers and movers service.

reviews.title: So easy
reviews.text: So fast and easy. Definitely using again.
